author: Special Correspondent
text: Two persons – S. Semmayi alias Shanmugam (37) and C. Shanmugam (32) both of Pudukottai have been detained under the Goondas Act. An official release here on Sunday said the two were involved in the murder of S. Nagaraj (24) in the town on March 8 this year.
title: Two arrested under Goonda's Act
